__TOC__

Otto Kekäläinen works for <nowiki>[[http://www.sange.fi/|Sange Coop]]</nowiki>, Helsinki, Finland.

=== Projects involved in: ===

==== Open Source / Linux in general ====
* <nowiki>[[http://www.linux-tuki.fi/|Linux-tuki]]</nowiki> (Linux Support Finland)
* <nowiki>[[http://linux.sange.fi/|Linux ja avoin lähdekoodi]]</nowiki> (Open Source and Linux promotion site)
* <nowiki>[[http://www.educoss.org/wiki/|EduCOSS wiki]]</nowiki> (Open Source promotion in schools)
* Finnish localization of The Open Disc project at www.valo-cd.fi
* I've done lots of papers and presentations on FOSS - I consider myself a major advocate of FOSS.

==== Ubuntu ====
* <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.fi/|Ubuntu-esittelysivu suomeksi]]</nowiki> (Ubuntu promotion site in Finnish)
* FinnishTeam and www.ubuntu-fi.org
* Localized Finnish Ubuntu Desktop CD versions: 5.04, 5.10, 6.06, 6.10, 7.04 etc... (newest at sale at http://www.linux-tuki.fi/linux-cd)
* Basic Ubuntu-guide in Finnish (pdf version of 2nd edition at http://ubuntu.sange.fi/ubuntu-pikaopas.pdf - the printed version has a different ISBN number) which has been published in Finland
